extendedInfo.description: Games for school kids. One pair contains an operation and its correspondence. ex if the first card is 2x2, so its correspondence is 4. Your task is to find all the pairs. Click on the tiles, pair by pair, to open the images. If you find a correct pair, the images will stay uncovered. If you miss, they will flip back. Let's see how much time you need to open all of the pairs!
